name: Templates
body:
* [Tip Calculator](paribus://addtemplate/https://raw.github.com/paribuscalc/templates/master/Templates/Tip_Calculator.botn)  
Calculates 15%, 18%, and 20% tips based on a price. Also does splits.
* [Sales_Profit](paribus://addtemplate/https://raw.github.com/paribuscalc/templates/master/Templates/Sales_Profit.botn)  
Calculates simple profit margin given cost and price.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
